name: getGraphQLClient
description: Use this method to create the GraphQL client that will communicate with the server that contains the schema. Pass the configuration parameters to get the client.

params.name: parameterStruct
params.description: A structure defining the properties of the GraphQL client

links.description: Overview of GraphQL, including how to use it in ColdFusion

examples.title: Create a GraphQL client (Script syntax)
examples.description: Creates a GraphQL client with specified properties
